metadata.name: Synapse Workspaces
metadata.description: This module deploys a Synapse Workspace.
Required. The name of the Synapse Workspace.
Optional. The geo-location where the resource lives.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. Enable or Disable AzureADOnlyAuthentication on All Workspace sub-resource.
Optional. AAD object ID of initial workspace admin.
Required. Resource ID of the default ADLS Gen2 storage account.
Required. The default ADLS Gen2 file system.

Optional. Create managed private endpoint to the default storage account or not. If Yes is selected, a managed private endpoint connection request is sent to the workspace's primary Data Lake Storage Gen2 account for Spark pools to access data. This must be approved by an owner of the storage account.
Optional. Double encryption using a customer-managed key.
Conditional. The resource ID of a key vault to reference a customer managed key for encryption from. Required if 'cMKKeyName' is not empty.
Optional. The name of the customer managed key to use for encryption.
Optional. Use System Assigned Managed identity that will be used to access your customer-managed key stored in key vault.
Optional. The ID of User Assigned Managed identity that will be used to access your customer-managed key stored in key vault.
Optional. Activate workspace by adding the system managed identity in the KeyVault containing the customer managed key and activating the workspace.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).

Optional. Workspace managed resource group. The resource group name uniquely identifies the resource group within the user subscriptionId. The resource group name must be no longer than 90 characters long, and must be alphanumeric characters (Char.IsLetterOrDigit()) and '-', '_', '(', ')' and'.'. Note that the name cannot end with '.'.
Optional. Enable this to ensure that connection from your workspace to your data sources use Azure Private Links. You can create managed private endpoints to your data sources.
Optional. The Integration Runtimes to create.
Optional. Allowed AAD Tenant IDs For Linking.
Optional. Linked Access Check On Target Resource.
Optional. Prevent Data Exfiltration.
Optional. Enable or Disable public network access to workspace.
Optional. Purview Resource ID.
Required. Login for administrator access to the workspace's SQL pools.
Optional. Password for administrator access to the workspace's SQL pools. If you don't provide a password, one will be automatically generated. You can change the password later.
Optional. Git integration settings.
Optional. The ID(s) to assign to the resource.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Optional. Configuration details for private endpoints. For security reasons, it is recommended to use private endpoints whenever possible.
Optional. Specifies the number of days that logs will be kept for; a value of 0 will retain data indefinitely.
Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic storage account.
Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic log analytics workspace.
Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic event hub authorization rule for the Event Hubs namespace in which the event hub should be created or streamed to.
Optional. Name of the diagnostic event hub within the namespace to which logs are streamed. Without this, an event hub is created for each log category.
Optional. The name of logs that will be streamed. "allLogs" includes all possible logs for the resource. Set to '' to disable log collection.
Optional. The name of the diagnostic setting, if deployed. If left empty, it defaults to "<resourceName>-diagnosticSettings".

variables.diagnosticsLogs: [if(contains(parameters('diagnosticLogCategoriesToEnable'), 'allLogs'), createArray(createObject('categoryGroup', 'allLogs', 'enabled', true(), 'retentionPolicy', createObject('enabled', true(), 'days', parameters('diagnosticLogsRetentionInDays')))), if(contains(parameters('diagnosticLogCategoriesToEnable'), ''), createArray(), variables('diagnosticsLogsSpecified')))]

properties.encryption: [if(parameters('encryption'), createObject('cmk', createObject('kekIdentity', createObject('userAssignedIdentity', if(not(empty(parameters('cMKUserAssignedIdentityResourceId'))), parameters('cMKUserAssignedIdentityResourceId'), null()), 'useSystemAssignedIdentity', parameters('cMKUseSystemAssignedIdentity')), 'key', createObject('keyVaultUrl', reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', split(parameters('cMKKeyVaultResourceId'), '/')[2], split(parameters('cMKKeyVaultResourceId'), '/')[4]), 'Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/keys', split(format('{0}/{1}', last(split(parameters('cMKKeyVaultResourceId'), '/')), parameters('cMKKeyName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', last(split(parameters('cMKKeyVaultResourceId'), '/')), parameters('cMKKeyName')), '/')[1]), '2021-10-01').keyUri, 'name', parameters('cMKKeyName')))), null())]

properties.notes: [if(equals(parameters('lock'), 'CanNotDelete'), 'Cannot delete resource or child resources.', 'Cannot modify the resource or child resources.')]

metadata.name: Synapse Workspace Integration Runtimes
metadata.description: This module deploys a Synapse Workspace Integration Runtime.
Conditional. The name of the parent Synapse Workspace. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Required. The name of the Integration Runtime.
Required. The type of Integration Runtime.
Conditional. Integration Runtime type properties. Required if type is "Managed".
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).

resources.name: [format('{0}/{1}', parameters('workspaceName'), parameters('name'))]
resources.properties: [if(equals(parameters('type'), 'Managed'), createObject('type', parameters('type'), 'managedVirtualNetwork', createObject('referenceName', 'default', 'type', 'ManagedVirtualNetworkReference'), 'typeProperties', parameters('typeProperties')), createObject('type', parameters('type')))]

metadata.description: The name of the Resource Group the Integration Runtime was created in.
The name of the Integration Runtime.
The resource ID of the Integration Runtime.

metadata.name: Synapse Workspaces Keys
metadata.description: This module deploys a Synapse Workspaces Key.
Required. Encryption key name.
Conditional. The name of the parent Synapse Workspace. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Optional. The geo-location where the resource lives.
Required. Used to activate the workspace after a customer managed key is provided.
Optional. The resource ID of a key vault to reference a customer managed key for encryption from.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).

properties.keyVaultUrl: [reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', split(parameters('keyVaultResourceId'), '/')[2], split(parameters('keyVaultResourceId'), '/')[4]), 'Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults/keys', split(format('{0}/{1}', last(split(parameters('keyVaultResourceId'), '/')), parameters('name')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', last(split(parameters('keyVaultResourceId'), '/')), parameters('name')), '/')[1]), '2022-07-01').keyUri]

metadata.description: The name of the deployed key.
The resource ID of the deployed key.
The resource group of the deployed key.

metadata.name: Private Endpoints
metadata.description: This module deploys a Private Endpoint.
Required. Name of the private endpoint resource to create.
Required. Resource ID of the subnet where the endpoint needs to be created.
Required. Resource ID of the resource that needs to be connected to the network.
Optional. Application security groups in which the private endpoint IP configuration is included.
Optional. The custom name of the network interface attached to the private endpoint.
Optional. A list of IP configurations of the private endpoint. This will be used to map to the First Party Service endpoints.
Required. Subtype(s) of the connection to be created. The allowed values depend on the type serviceResourceId refers to.
Optional. The private DNS zone group configuration used to associate the private endpoint with one or multiple private DNS zones. A DNS zone group can support up to 5 DNS zones.
Optional. Location for all Resources.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Optional. Tags to be applied on all resources/resource groups in this deployment.
Optional. Custom DNS configurations.
Optional. Manual PrivateLink Service Connections.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).

properties.notes: [if(equals(parameters('lock'), 'CanNotDelete'), 'Cannot delete resource or child resources.', 'Cannot modify the resource or child resources.')]

metadata.name: Private Endpoint Private DNS Zone Groups
metadata.description: This module deploys a Private Endpoint Private DNS Zone Group.
Conditional. The name of the parent private endpoint. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Required. Array of private DNS zone resource IDs. A DNS zone group can support up to 5 DNS zones.
Optional. The name of the private DNS zone group.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).
The name of the private endpoint DNS zone group.
The resource ID of the private endpoint DNS zone group.
The resource group the private endpoint DNS zone group was deployed into.
Required. The IDs of the principals to assign the role to.
Required. The name of the role to assign. If it cannot be found you can specify the role definition ID instead.
Required. The resource ID of the resource to apply the role assignment to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container".
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
The resource group the private endpoint was deployed into.
The resource ID of the private endpoint.
The name of the private endpoint.
The location the resource was deployed into.
The resource ID of the deployed Synapse Workspace.
The name of the deployed Synapse Workspace.
The resource group of the deployed Synapse Workspace.
The workspace connectivity endpoints.
The principal ID of the system assigned identity.
The location the resource was deployed into.
